item.title: INTO THE WORLD
item.description:
INTO THE WORLD

THE STORY ABOUT THE BOYS WHO DO NOT WANT TO GROW UP

item.title: INTO THE WORLD - the story about the boys who do not want to grow up.
item.description: INTO THE WORLD - the story about the boys who do not want to grow up.

item.title: Does your child have a story in their own LITTLE WORLD?? Share the story with us, and tag a friend! Use #itwstories for a feature. some of them will be on end-credits of #itwfilm!! - "Every child has a favourite place known only to himself/herself. That is their own LITTLE world, No one can go in there - even parents and friends. In there they feel the wind, based in light, and listen the music." - Shunsuke Okubo, dir.-writer.
